briefdescription.para: Creates a new Gooey window.

detaileddescription.para: This function initializes a new window with the given title, width, and height.

parameterdescription.para: The title of the window.
The width of the window.
The height of the window.

briefdescription.para: Creates a radio button group widget.

parameterdescription.para: The window containing the radio button group.

memberdef.argsstring: (GooeyRadioButtonGroup *group, int x, int y, const char *label, void(*callback)(bool))
memberdef.name: GooeyRadioButtonGroup_AddChild

briefdescription.para: Creates a radio button group widget.

parameterdescription.para: The window containing the radio button group.
The x-coordinate of the radio button.
The y-coordinate of the radio button.
The text (label) of the radio button.
The callback for selecting that specific radio button, pass NULL if not needed.

briefdescription.para: Handles RadioButtonGroup click events.

parameterdescription.para: The window containing the dropdown menu.
The x-coordinate of the click event.
The y-coordinate of the click event.

simplesect.para: True if the dropdown menu was clicked, false otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (GooeyWindow *win, const char *label, int x, int y, int width, int height, void(*callback)())
memberdef.name: GooeyButton_Add

briefdescription.para: Adds a button to the window.

parameterdescription.para: The window to add the button to.
The label to display on the button.
The x-coordinate of the button's position.
The y-coordinate of the button's position.
The width of the button.
The height of the button.
The callback function to call when the button is clicked.

briefdescription.para: Handles button click events.

parameterdescription.para: The window containing the button.
The x-coordinate of the click event.
The y-coordinate of the click event.

simplesect.para: True if the button was clicked, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Sets the text of the button.

parameterdescription.para: The button to set the text for.
The new text to display on the button.

memberdef.argsstring: (GooeyWindow *win, GooeyLayoutType layout_type, int x, int y, int width, int height)
memberdef.name: GooeyLayout_Create

briefdescription.para: Creates a layout for the specified window.

detaileddescription.para: Initializes a new layout with a specified layout type, position, and size within the window.

parameterdescription.para: The window to attach the layout to.
The type of layout (e.g., grid, box).
The x-coordinate of the layout's position.
The y-coordinate of the layout's position.
The width of the layout.
The height of the layout.

briefdescription.para: Adds a child widget to a layout.

parameterdescription.para: The layout to which the widget will be added.
The widget to add to the layout.

briefdescription.para: Builds the layout, arranging all child widgets according to the layout type.

parameterdescription.para: The layout to build.

briefdescription.para: Sets the menu for the Gooey window.

detaileddescription.para: Initializes and sets the menu for the given window.

parameterdescription.para: The window to set the menu for.

briefdescription.para: Draws the menu for the window.

detaileddescription.para: Renders the menu on the window.

parameterdescription.para: The window to draw the menu for.

briefdescription.para: Adds a child menu item to the window's menu.

parameterdescription.para: The window to add the menu item to.
The title of the menu item.

briefdescription.para: Handles menu item click events.

parameterdescription.para: The window containing the menu.
The x-coordinate of the click event.
The y-coordinate of the click event.

memberdef.argsstring: (GooeyWindow *win, const char *text, int x, int y)

The y-coordinate of the label's position.

The x-coordinate of the textbox's position.
The y-coordinate of the textbox's position.
The width of the textbox.
The height of the textbox.
The callback function to call when the text changes.

briefdescription.para: Gets the text of the textbox.

parameterdescription.para: The textbox to retrieve text from.

simplesect.para: The current text of the textbox.

briefdescription.para: Sets the text of the textbox.

parameterdescription.para: The textbox to set the text for.
The new text to set in the textbox.

briefdescription.para: Draws the textbox on the window.

parameterdescription.para: The window to draw the textbox on.
The index of the textbox to draw.

briefdescription.para: Handles key press events for the textbox.

parameterdescription.para: The window containing the textbox.
The key event to handle.

briefdescription.para: Handles textbox click events.

parameterdescription.para: The window containing the textbox.
The x-coordinate of the click event.

simplesect.para: True if the textbox was clicked, false otherwise.

parameterdescription.para: The window containing the checkbox.

briefdescription.para: Adds a slider to the window.

parameterdescription.para: The window to add the slider to.
The x-coordinate of the slider's position.
The y-coordinate of the slider's position.
The width of the slider.
The minimum value of the slider.
The maximum value of the slider.
Whether to show hints for the slider.
The callback function to call when the slider value changes.

briefdescription.para: Handles slider drag events.

parameterdescription.para: The window containing the slider.
The x-coordinate of the drag event.
The y-coordinate of the drag event.

simplesect.para: True if the slider was dragged, false otherwise.

simplesect.para: The current value of the slider.

The new value for the slider.

memberdef.name: GooeyDropdown_Add

briefdescription.para: Adds a dropdown menu to the window.

parameterdescription.para: The window to add the dropdown menu to.
The x-coordinate of the dropdown's position.
The y-coordinate of the dropdown's position.
The width of the dropdown menu.
The height of the dropdown menu.
The list of options for the dropdown menu.
The number of options.
The callback function to call when an option is selected.

briefdescription.para: Handles dropdown menu click events.

parameterdescription.para: The window containing the dropdown menu.
The x-coordinate of the click event.
The y-coordinate of the click event.

simplesect.para: True if the dropdown menu was clicked, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Runs the Gooey window.

detaileddescription.para: This function enters the main event loop and begins processing user input and window events for the provided Gooey window.

parameterdescription.para: The window to run.
